00040         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_RECTANGLE 1
00041         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_LINE 2
00042         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_POLYGON 4
00043 
00044         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_MASK 255
00045 
00046         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_RECTANGLE (KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_RECTANGLE | (1 << 8))
00047         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_RICHTEXT  (KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_RECTANGLE | (2 << 8))
00048         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_LINE      (KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_LINE | (3 << 8))
00049         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_ELLIPSE   (KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_RECTANGLE | (4 << 8))
00050         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CHORD     (KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_RECTANGLE | (5 << 8))
00051         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_PIE       (KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_RECTANGLE | (6 << 8))
00052         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_POLYGON   (KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_POLYGON | (7 << 8))
00053 
00054         #define KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE(__item) (__item->rtti() & KVI_CANVAS_RTTI_CONTROL_TYPE_MASK)

00058         class KviCanvasPolygon : public QCanvasPolygon
00059         {
00060         public:
00061                 KviCanvasPolygon(QCanvas * c,int x,int y,QPointArray &pnts,double dScaleFactor);
00062                 virtual ~KviCanvasPolygon();
00063         protected:
00064                 QMap<QString,QVariant> m_properties;
00065                 double                 m_dScaleFactor;
00066                 QPointArray            m_points;
00067         public:
00068                 virtual void draw(QPainter & p);
00069                 double scaleFactor(){ return m_dScaleFactor; };
00070                 void setScaleFactor(double dScaleFactor);
00071                 void resetPoints();
00072                 const QPointArray & internalPoints(){ return m_points; };
00073                 void setInternalPoints(const QPointArray &pnts);
00074                 QMap<QString,QVariant> * properties(){ return &m_properties; };
00075                 virtual void setProperty(const QString &property,const QVariant &val);
00076                 virtual int rtti() const;
00077         };

00080         class KviCanvasRectangleItem : public QCanvasRectangle
00081         {
00082                 friend class KviCanvasRectangle;
00083                 friend class KviCanvasRichText;
00084                 friend class KviCanvasEllipticItem;
00085         protected:
00086                 KviCanvasRectangleItem(QCanvas * c,int x,int y,int w,int h);
00087         public:
00088                 virtual ~KviCanvasRectangleItem();
00089         protected:
00090                 QMap<QString,QVariant> m_properties;
00091         public:
00092                 int right(){ return ((int)x()) + width(); };
00093                 int bottom(){ return ((int)y()) + height(); };
00094                 QMap<QString,QVariant> * properties(){ return &m_properties; };
00095                 virtual void setProperty(const QString &property,const QVariant &val);
00096         //      QVariant property(const QString &name){ return m_properties[name]; };
00097         protected:
00098                 void drawSelection(QPainter &p);
00099         };

00190         class KviCanvasView : public QCanvasView
00191         {
00192                 Q_OBJECT
00193         public:
00194                 KviCanvasView(QCanvas * c,DccCanvasWidget * cw,QWidget * par);
00195                 ~KviCanvasView();
00196         public:
00197                 enum State { Idle, SelectOrigin };
00198                 enum ObjectType {
00199                         Rectangle, RichText, Line, Ellipse, Chord, Pie,
00200                         PolygonTriangle, PolygonRectangle, PolygonPentagon,
00201                         PolygonHexagon
00202                 };
00203                 enum DragMode {
00204                         None, All, Left, Right, Top, Bottom, LeftTop, RightTop,
00205                         LeftBottom, RightBottom, Scale, SinglePoint, Rotate
00206                 };
00207         protected:
00208                 DccCanvasWidget * m_pCanvasWidget;
00209 
00210                 // Insertion of objects
00211                 State             m_state;
00212                 ObjectType        m_objectToInsert;
00213 
00214                 // Selected item
00215                 QCanvasItem   * m_pSelectedItem;
00216 
00217                 DragMode          m_dragMode;
00218                 QPoint            m_dragBegin;
00219                 double            m_dragScaleFactor;
00220                 unsigned int      m_dragPointIndex;
00221                 QPointArray       m_dragPointArray;
00222         protected:
00223                 void beginDragRectangle(KviCanvasRectangleItem * it,const QPoint &p,bool bInitial = false);
00224                 void dragRectangle(KviCanvasRectangleItem * it,const QPoint & p);
00225 
00226                 void beginDragLine(KviCanvasLine * it,const QPoint &p,bool bInitial = false);
00227                 void dragLine(KviCanvasLine * it,const QPoint &p);
00228 
00229                 void beginDragPolygon(KviCanvasPolygon * it,const QPoint &p,bool bShift = false,bool bCtrl = false);
00230                 void dragPolygon(KviCanvasPolygon * it,const QPoint &p);
00231 
00232                 void setItemSelected(QCanvasItem * it);
00233                 void clearSelection();
00234                 void insertObjectAt(const QPoint & pnt,ObjectType o);
00235                 virtual void contentsMousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *e);
00236                 virtual void contentsMouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *e);
00237                 virtual void contentsMouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *e);
00238         public slots:
00239                 void insertRectangle();
00240                 void insertRichText();
00241                 void insertLine();
00242                 void insertPie();
00243                 void insertChord();
00244                 void insertEllipse();
00245                 void insertPolygonTriangle();
00246                 void insertPolygonRectangle();
00247                 void insertPolygonPentagon();
00248                 void insertPolygonHexagon();
00249                 void propertyChanged(const QString &s,const QVariant &v);
00250         };
